snippet: “Great Russian Nutcracker” is the Moscow Ballet’s take on this classic, with choreography by Stanislav Vlasov.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews Moscow Ballet production of The Nutcracker at Hammerstein Ballroom.
lead_paragraph: “Great Russian Nutcracker” is the Moscow Ballet’s take on this classic, with choreography by Stanislav Vlasov.

headline.seo: Moscow Ballet Arrives With Its ‘Great Russian Nutcracker’
headline.main: A Christmas Tale From a Faraway Land of Snow and Ice
headline.print_headline: A Christmas Tale From a Faraway Land of Snow and Ice
